name: S&I 00
description:
S&I 00 - Start of a new Series: 'Structure & Infill'.
Exploring open configurations designed at: H=N BLOCK+A, an extension patch(Architecture Kit) for H=N BLOCK, enabling realtime collaborative design using an architectural kit of parts. 
_________________ 
by Alexander Grasser, 2021 @grasser_alex alexandergrasser.com #collaborativeobjects #realtimearchitecture #architecturemachine
